cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how AI Productivity Hub uses cookies or similar technologies on aiprod.app.
cookies.section1.body: We do not use advertising cookies or third-party tracking cookies. The app may use essential technical mechanisms required for authentication and basic functionality.
cookies.section1.title: 1. Do We Use Cookies?
cookies.section2.body: We use Plausible Analytics to understand aggregate usage and improve the product. Plausible is privacy-friendly and does not use invasive tracking or third-party advertising cookies.
cookies.section2.title: 2. Analytics
cookies.section3.body: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect your ability to log in or use some features.
cookies.section3.title: 3. Managing Cookies
cookies.section4.body: If you have questions about this Cookie Policy, contact us at:
cookies.section4.title: 4. Contact
cookies.title: Cookie Policy

privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how AI Productivity Hub (owned by Anargyros Sgouros) ("we", "our", or "the app") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website and services at aiprod.app and our Android app.
privacy.section1.1.body: When you create an account, we collect your email address and securely store your authentication details using Supabase Authentication.
privacy.section1.1.title: 1.1 Account Information
privacy.section1.2.body: We store the content you create in the app, such as notes, tasks, daily planner entries, trips, daily scores, weekly goals and weekly reports. This data is linked to your account and is private to you.
privacy.section1.2.title: 1.2 User-Generated Content
privacy.section1.3.body: We collect limited technical and usage information such as feature usage counts (for AI limits and productivity statistics) and anonymized analytics via Plausible Analytics. We do not use invasive tracking or third-party advertising cookies.
privacy.section1.3.title: 1.3 Usage & Technical Data
privacy.section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.section2.item1: Provide the core app features (notes, tasks, planner, AI tools)
privacy.section2.item2: Track your daily score and generate weekly reports
privacy.section2.item3: Enforce AI usage limits based on your plan (Free / Pro)
privacy.section2.item4: Process payments and manage subscriptions via Stripe
privacy.section2.item5: Improve stability, performance and user experience
privacy.section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.section3.body: We do not sell or trade your personal data. We only share data with the following service providers, as needed:
privacy.section3.item1: Supabase ‚Äì authentication, database and secure data storage
privacy.section3.item1.suffix: ‚Äì authentication, database and secure data storage
privacy.section3.item2: Stripe ‚Äì payment processing and subscription billing
privacy.section3.item4: AI provider ‚Äì processing text you send for AI features (we do not use AI outputs for advertising or profiling)
privacy.section3.item4.label: AI provider
privacy.section3.item4.suffix: ‚Äì processing text you send for AI features (we do not use AI outputs for advertising or profiling)
privacy.section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
privacy.section4.body: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. When you request account deletion, we delete your personal data and associated content from our systems within a reasonable timeframe, except where we must retain limited information for legal, billing or security reasons.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Data Retention
privacy.section5.body: All connections to the app use HTTPS encryption. Data is stored in Supabase with row-level security to ensure each user only has access to their own records. No system is perfectly secure, but we take reasonable measures to protect your information.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Security
privacy.section6.body: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, update or delete your data. You can delete your account at any time using the in-app option or by contacting us. For details, see:
privacy.section6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.section7.body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, contact us at:
privacy.section7.title: 7. Contact
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

settings.weeklyReport.description: Get a weekly AI-generated report with your productivity score, streak, completed tasks, and focus suggestions for next week.
settings.weeklyReport.proOnly: This is a Pro feature. Upgrade to unlock weekly email reports.
setupBanner.body: Choose your AI tone, main focus area and email preferences in Settings. It takes under a minute.
setupBanner.title: Finish your setup to get better AI summaries & weekly reports
tasks.empty: No tasks yet. Add your first one above.
tasks.form.repeat.help: Repeating reminders use your local timezone.
tasks.form.repeat.label: Repeat
tasks.subtitle: Capture tasks, check them off, and keep track of your progress.
tasks.title: Tasks
templates.howToUse.1: Browse or search for a template by category (Planning, Study, Writing, Work, Personal).
templates.howToUse.2: Click "ü§ñ Use with Assistant" to send the template into the AI Hub Chat. You can tweak the text or add extra details before you hit send.
templates.howToUse.3: Click "View / edit" to open the full template, see the exact prompt, and customize it for your own workflow.
templates.howToUse.4: Templates marked "Pro" are available for Pro / Founder users (or if it's a template you created yourself).
templates.howToUse.5: The more you use a template, the higher it moves in "Trending public templates" on the right side.
templates.howToUse.title: How to use these templates
templates.subtitle: Reusable prompts for planning, focus, study, and writing. Use them with the assistant in one click.
templates.title: AI Templates
templates.trending.tip: Make one of your templates public and use it often to push it into the trending list.
templates.trending.title: üî• Trending public templates
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of AI Productivity Hub ("the app"), including our website at aiprod.app and our Android app. By creating an account or using the app, you agree to these Terms.
terms.section1.body: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activity under your account. You must provide accurate information and keep it up to date.
terms.section1.title: 1. Accounts
terms.section2.body: Paid plans (such as Pro) may be offered and are processed via Stripe. Pricing, billing cycles, and benefits are shown in the app. Taxes may apply depending on your location. You can manage or cancel your subscription through the method provided at purchase.
terms.section2.title: 2. Subscriptions and Payments
terms.section3.body: You agree not to misuse the app, interfere with its operation, attempt unauthorized access, or use the app for illegal activities. You also agree not to upload or generate content that violates applicable laws or third-party rights.
terms.section3.title: 3. Acceptable Use
terms.section4.body: You retain ownership of content you create in the app (such as notes, tasks, and plans). You grant us permission to process that content solely to provide and improve the app features, including AI-powered features.
terms.section4.title: 4. User Content
terms.section5.body: AI outputs are generated automatically and may be inaccurate or incomplete. You are responsible for how you use AI outputs. The app is not a substitute for professional advice (medical, legal, financial, or otherwise).
terms.section5.title: 5. AI Features
terms.section6.body: We may modify, suspend, or discontinue parts of the app at any time. We aim to keep the service available but do not guarantee uninterrupted access.
terms.section6.title: 6. Service Availability and Changes
terms.section7.body: You may stop using the app at any time. We may suspend or terminate access if you violate these Terms. You can request account deletion; see the deletion page in the Privacy Policy.
terms.section7.title: 7. Termination
terms.section8.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, AI Productivity Hub and its owner will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of data, profits, or revenues, arising from your use of the app.
terms.section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
terms.section9.body: If you have questions about these Terms, contact us at:
terms.section9.title: 9. Contact
terms.title: Terms of Service
tools.aiCompanion.bestFor1: Daily check-ins (how you feel, what‚Äôs on your mind, what you need today)
tools.aiCompanion.bestFor2: Calming down when you feel anxious, overwhelmed, or stuck
tools.aiCompanion.bestFor3: Turning messy emotions into clear reflections you can act on
tools.aiCompanion.bestFor4: Saving meaningful conversations as journal entries in Notes
tools.aiCompanion.description: AI Companion is your calm, private chat space for reflection and emotional clarity. It‚Äôs designed for gentle journaling-style conversations: you can talk through stress, anxiety, relationships, work pressure, or simply do a quick check-in. Each conversation is saved to your history, and you can optionally save the chat as a Journal note so your insights don‚Äôt disappear. Not a therapist, no diagnosis ‚Äî but a supportive, structured space to slow down and take small next steps.
tools.aiCompanion.howToUse1: Open AI Companion and pick a category (General, Stress, Work, Relationships, etc.) to shape the tone and questions.
tools.aiCompanion.howToUse2: Start with a starter prompt (or just type what‚Äôs happening). You can also use the mic for voice input.
tools.aiCompanion.howToUse3: Keep chatting until you feel clearer. Your conversation history stays in the sidebar so you can revisit later.
tools.aiCompanion.howToUse4: When something is worth keeping, click ‚ÄúSave as journal‚Äù to store it as a Journal note in Notes.
tools.aiCompanion.name: AI Companion
tools.aiCompanion.proHint: Use categories like Stress or Work when you want the companion to ask more targeted questions and guide you toward small, realistic next steps.
tools.aiCompanion.shortTagline: A private space to reflect, feel grounded, and write it out.
tools.aiTaskCreator.bestFor1: Breaking big projects into small, shippable steps
tools.aiTaskCreator.bestFor2: Planning a study plan, side-project, or new habit
tools.aiTaskCreator.bestFor3: Overcoming procrastination by making the next step tiny and obvious
tools.aiTaskCreator.description: The AI Task Creator is for those moments where you know what you want, but not how to break it down. Paste your goal or brain dump, and AI will propose concrete tasks you can send straight into your Tasks list.
tools.aiTaskCreator.howToUse1: Open the AI Task Creator from the navigation or from the Tasks page link.
tools.aiTaskCreator.howToUse2: Describe your goal or paste your messy notes (e.g. 'I want to redesign my website this month').
tools.aiTaskCreator.howToUse3: Ask AI to generate a list of tasks. Adjust any task titles, add / remove steps until it feels right.
